com.zendesk.sdk.network

Interface RequestService


  • public interface RequestService
    Defines the operations that can be carried out on Requests.

    Currently this is defined using retrofit annotations but this could be changed in the future as long as these signatures remain.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addComment(String authorization, String id, UpdateRequestWrapper updateRequestWrapper, retrofit.Callback<Request> callback) 
      void createRequest(String authorization, CreateRequestWrapper request, retrofit.Callback<RequestResponse> callback) 
      void getAllRequests(String authorization, String status, String include, retrofit.Callback<RequestsResponse> callback) 
      void getComments(String authorization, String id, retrofit.Callback<CommentsResponse> callback) 
      void getManyRequests(String authorization, String requestTokens, String status, String include, retrofit.Callback<RequestsResponse> callback) 

    • Method Detail

      • createRequest

        @POST(value="/api/mobile/requests.json")
void createRequest(@Header(value="Authorization")
                      String authorization,
                      @Body
                      CreateRequestWrapper request,
                      retrofit.Callback<RequestResponse> callback)

      • getAllRequests

        @GET(value="/api/mobile/requests.json")
void getAllRequests(@Header(value="Authorization")
                      String authorization,
                      @Query(value="status")
                      String status,
                      @Query(value="include")
                      String include,
                      retrofit.Callback<RequestsResponse> callback)

      • getManyRequests

        @GET(value="/api/mobile/requests/show_many.json")
void getManyRequests(@Header(value="Authorization")
                       String authorization,
                       @Query(value="tokens")
                       String requestTokens,
                       @Query(value="status")
                       String status,
                       @Query(value="include")
                       String include,
                       retrofit.Callback<RequestsResponse> callback)

      • getComments

        @GET(value="/api/mobile/requests/{id}/comments.json?sort_by=updated_at&sort_order=desc")
void getComments(@Header(value="Authorization")
                   String authorization,
                   @Path(value="id")
                   String id,
                   retrofit.Callback<CommentsResponse> callback)

      • addComment

        @PUT(value="/api/mobile/requests/{id}.json")
void addComment(@Header(value="Authorization")
                  String authorization,
                  @Path(value="id")
                  String id,
                  @Body
                  UpdateRequestWrapper updateRequestWrapper,
                  retrofit.Callback<Request> callback)
